mapper.select: select sid, file, name, tel, addr, date_format(open_time,'%H:%i') as open_time, date_format(end_time,'%H:%i') as end_time, foodType, userId from shop_info
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_info(name, tel, addr, open_time, end_time, foodType, userId) VALUES (#{name}, #{tel}, #{addr}, #{open_time}, #{end_time}, #{foodType}, #{userId})
